verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, You and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> with you shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>: and you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>.

And your <S%H251>brothers<s%> also of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H7126>bring<s%> you with <S%H3867>you<s%>, that they may be joined unto <S%H8334>you<s%>, and minister unto <S%H1121>you<s%>: but you and your sons with you shall minister <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>witness<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H4931>charge<s%>, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of all the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>: only they shall not come <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that neither <S%H4191>they<s%>, nor you also, die.

And they shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> unto <S%H8104>you<s%>, and keep the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, for all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>: and a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> shall not come near unto <S%H7126>you<s%>.

And you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: that there be no <S%H7110>wrath<s%> any more upon the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3947>I<s%>, behold, I have taken your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: to you they are <S%H5414>given<s%> as a <S%H4979>gift<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

Therefore you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H3550>priest<s%>'s office for every <S%H1697>thing<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H1004>inside<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%>; and you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%>: I have <S%H5414>given<s%> your <S%H3550>priest<s%>'s office unto you as a <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H4979>gift<s%>: and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> that comes <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I also have given you the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of my heave <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of all the hallowed <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; unto you have I <S%H5414>given<s%> them by reason of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%>, and to your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, by an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

This shall be your of the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, reserved from the <S%H784>fire<s%>: every <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of <S%H4503>theirs<s%>, every food offering of <S%H2403>theirs<s%>, and every sin offering of <S%H817>theirs<s%>, and every trespass offering of <S%H7725>theirs<s%>, which they shall render unto <S%H6944>me<s%>, shall be most <S%H6944>holy<s%> for you and for your <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
In the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2145>it<s%>; every male shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6944>it<s%>: it shall be holy unto you.

And this is <S%H8641>your<s%>; the heave offering of their <S%H4976>gift<s%>, with all the wave <S%H8573>offerings<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them unto <S%H1121>you<s%>, and to your sons and to your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with <S%H2706>you<s%>, by a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: every one that is <S%H2889>clean<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> shall eat of <S%H398>it<s%>.

All the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H3323>oil<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and of the <S%H1715>wheat<s%>, the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> of them which they shall <S%H5414>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, them have I given <S%H5414>you<s%>.

And whatever is first <S%H1061>ripe<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, which they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, shall be <S%H2889>your<s%>; every one that is clean in your <S%H1004>house<s%> shall eat of <S%H398>it<s%>.
Every thing <S%H2764>devoted<s%> in Israel shall be <S%H3478>your<s%>.

Every thing that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> in all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, which they <S%H7126>bring<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, whether it be of <S%H120>men<s%> or <S%H929>animals<s%>, shall be <S%H1060>your<s%>: nevertheless the firstborn of <S%H120>man<s%> shall you <S%H6299>surely<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%>, and the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animals<s%> shall you <S%H6299>redeem<s%>.

And those that are to be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall you <S%H6299>redeem<s%>, according to your <S%H6187>estimation<s%>, for the <S%H3701>money<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, which is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>.

But the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of a <S%H7794>cow<s%>, or the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of a <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, or the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of a <S%H5795>goat<s%>, you shall not <S%H6299>redeem<s%>; they are <S%H6944>holy<s%>: you shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> their <S%H2459>fat<s%> for an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of them shall be <S%H8573>your<s%>, as the wave <S%H2373>breast<s%> and as the <S%H3225>right<s%> shoulder are <S%H7785>your<s%>.

All the heave <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, which the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7311>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, have I <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H1121>you<s%>, and your sons and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with <S%H2706>you<s%>, by a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: it is a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto you and to your seed with <S%H2233>you<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, You shall have no <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in their <S%H776>land<s%>, neither shall you have any <S%H2506>part<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2506>them<s%>: I am your part and your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H5414>And<s%>, behold, I have given the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> all the <S%H4643>tenth<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, <S%H2500>for<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> which they <S%H5647>serve<s%>, even the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

Neither must the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5750>henceforth<s%> come <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, lest they <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%>, and <S%H4191>die<s%>.

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and they shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>, that <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they <S%H5157>have<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

But the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they <S%H7311>offer<s%> as an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H5159>inherit<s%>: therefore I have <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8432>them<s%>, Among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they shall <S%H5157>have<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3947>them<s%>, When you take of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you from them for your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, then you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> up an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of it for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even a <S%H4643>tenth<s%> part of the <S%H4643>tithe<s%>.

And this your heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> shall be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> unto <S%H1715>you<s%>, as though it were the corn of the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%>, and as the <S%H4395>fullness<s%> of the <S%H3342>winepress<s%>.

Thus you also shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of all your <S%H4643>tithes<s%>, which you <S%H3947>receive<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> there the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

Out of all your <S%H4979>gifts<s%> you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> every heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, of all the <S%H2459>best<s%> <S%H4720>there<s%>, even the hallowed part there out of it.

Therefore you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H7311>them<s%>, When you have heaved the <S%H2459>best<s%> there from <S%H2803>it<s%>, then it shall be counted unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%>, and as the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H3342>winepress<s%>.

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in every <S%H4725>place<s%>, you and your <S%H1004>households<s%>: for it is your <S%H7939>reward<s%> <S%H2500>for<s%> your <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> no <S%H2399>sin<s%> by reason of <S%H7311>it<s%>, when you have heaved from it the <S%H2459>best<s%> of <S%H2490>it<s%>: neither shall you pollute the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, lest you <S%H4191>die<s%>.
